Name: xanthogranulomatous pyelonephritis
Definition: A cardiovascular system disease that involves the heart.

Name: obsolete depressive state induced by drug
Definition: A cardiovascular system disease that involves the heart.

Name: obsolete diphtheritic laryngotracheitis
Definition: A diphtheria that involves a bluish white membrane formation on the larynx. It can be an extension of the nasopharyngeal diphtheria. This membrane can lead to airway obstruction
